actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for the entitlement of disabled wives and husbands to unreduced wife's and husband's insurance benefits without regard to age.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Entitles disabled wives and husbands to unreduced wife's and husband's insurance benefits without regard to age, under title II (Old-Age, Survivors', and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act. Specifies the criteria to be met for entitlement to such benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for the entitlement of disabled wives and husbands to unreduced wife's and husband's insurance benefits without regard to age.
